item.title: Time to become better
item.description: â€‹ Summer finally arrives and it’s already over. Well come on, there’s still quite a while to go before we have to return to the daily grind. We still have a lot of free time to make use of. It’s in free time that one really understands what one wants. Vacation is the noblest time of the year, because it’s the time when one either commits to what he wants with the value he recognizes as prevalent in his life or he doesn’t commit to anything at all and then it’s a fool’s errand.
